text: Ali Asghar Mounesan (; born 1970) is an Iranian politician. He was born in Tehran. He has served as the Minister of Cultural Heritage since August 2019. He was the head of Cultural Heritage, Handcrafts and Tourism Organization from 2017 to 2019. In March 2020, Mounesan was reported ill. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Tehran
title: Ali Asghar Mounesan
